job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Our healthcare client is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join their team! </p><p><br></p><p>The Project: Working on a service layer that converts native API mostly built in JSON format to a HL7 FHIR API to interconnect health systems.</p><p><br></p><p>Your Background: Experience developing software with Java. FHIR knowledge is a plus</p><p><br></p><p>Job Responsibilities:</p><ul><li>Serve as a senior software developer for the software platform developing FHIR-based REST APIs.</li><li>Allocated time, on average:</li><li>75% of the time coding</li><li>25% of the time collaborating with solution architects/BA/QA on overall software implantation design and best practices</li><li>Provide input on software solution designs</li><li>Work across all teams as a subject matter expect</li><li>Mentor junior software developers on coding designs and best practices</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Required Skills:</p><ul><li>6+ years of experience with hands on development with C# or Java</li><li>8+ years of experience dev</li><li>2+ years of experience EHR clinical integrations</li><li>2+ years of experience with integrating services into a cloud architecture</li><li>2+ years of experience working with Docker containers</li><li>Experience working in Agile environment</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>We cannot provide sponsorship upon conversion</strong></p><p><br></p><p>What skills/attributes are preferred (will set a candidate apart)?</p><ul><li>2+ years of experience with good understanding on FHIR standard</li><li>2+ years of experience developing RESTFUL APIs</li><li>The ability to execute existing queries as well as write SQL queries of varying complexity</li><li>Experience with GIT for code repository</li><li>Experience with Jenkins for deployment automation</li><li>Understanding of software development processes and methodologies</li><li>Collaborate in team environment</li></ul>
